Table 2. Rendering speed -on various devices in frames per sec-
ond (FPS). The devices are on battery, except for the gaming lap-
top and the desktop which are plugged in, indicated with a . The 
mobile devices (first four rows) have almost identical rendering 
speed when plugged in. With the notation M 
N we indicate that M 
out of N testing scenes failed to run due to out-of-memory errors.
